body.p: The XSL preferences page defines the elements that the Content Completion Assistant suggests for the XSL editor in addition to the XSL elements. To open the XSL preferences page, go to Options Window Preferences oXygen XML Editor Editor Content Completion XSL .

You can choose an additional schema that will be used for documenting XSL stylesheets. Either select the built-in schema or choose a custom one. Supported schema types are XSD, RNG, RNC, DTD, and NDVL.
